Saga

【Notice】原文This plugin is now back under development. Due to the age of the plugin it requires a substantial amount of developement, and documentation. Work has begun on overhauling the plugin and on producing a new wiki as well as a website, however this is likely to take a while to be completed. Updates will be posted here in time, however for now a working version for Spigot/Bukkit (Most versions supported up to and including 1.8.8) has been posted for those of you still interested in running the plugin. Please bear with me over the coming months as I endeavour to get everything fully operational.





                   Saga is designed to be a complete solution for RPG servers. Saga allows players to form factions for pvp, establish settlements with numerous buildings, develop abilities and unlock skills. Here is a small list of some of features saga will bring to your server:Faction Features
Players can create factions and invite other players.Declare wars on factions and sieges on settlements.Wages based on the amount of taxes collected from settlements.Assign members roles that grant attribute bonuses, abilities and faction permissions.
Settlement Features
Ability to create settlements and invite players.Protection from outside influence.Settlements gain new claim points every minute, based on amount of online members.Member roles that grant attribute bonuses, abilities and settlement permissions.Building different buildings with various effects.
Player Features
Players gain attribute and ability points from killing both mobs and players and by harvesting resources.Training attributes provides various physical bonuses.Passive and active abilities.

传奇插件 是非常适合RPG服务器的一个插件。 传奇插件可以让玩家可以形成派系的pvp,建立定居点与众多建筑,提升能力和使用技能。 

?派系的特性 
?玩家可以创建派系,邀请其他玩家。 
?宣布战争派系,围攻定居点。 
?工资的税收来自于定居点的数量。 
?用钱分配成员角色授予属性、能力和派系权限。 
?结算功能 
?能够创建定居点和邀请玩家。 
?保护玩家不受派系以外的影响。 
?定居点获得新的索赔点每分钟,基于网络成员。 
?成员角色授予奖金属性、能力和解决权限。 
?建造不同的建筑与各种效果。 
?玩家有的特性
?玩家获得的属性和能力分杀死玩家和怪物，获取资源。 
?训练属性需要游戏币。 
?被动和主动的技能
